title: The Pirates of Capri 1949 | Louis Hayward, Alan Curtis | Full Movie | Subtitles

sources.title: The Pirates of Capri 1949 | Louis Hayward, Alan Curtis | Full Movie | Subtitles
sources.description:
Slashing his sword against all odds...during history's most exciting era!
In Naples in 1798, the foppish nobleman Count Amalfi (Louis Hayward), adviser to the Queen (Binnie Barnes), is secretly the heroic pirate Captain Sirocco, who leads a band of rebels to overthrow the aristocratic regime, dominated by villainous Police Chief Von Holstein (Massimo Serato).

Original title: I pirati di Capri (1949) AKA: The Pirates of Capri 

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/2GuOUOnmsns


This film is available with subtitles in many languages.

Director: Edgar G. Ulmer
Writers: Giorgio Moser, Golfiero Colonna, Sidney Alexander
Cast :  Louis Hayward, Binnie Barnes, Alan Curtis, Massimo Serato
Genres: Classics, Adventure, Action, Drama
